article_title: The Quiet Emergency In Health Care

article_metadata.author: Leah Binder

og.description: A quarter of all American workers suffer a debilitating condition that dramatically undermines their productivity and exposes them to the specter of serious illness and disability. This is “the single greatest quiet emergency in the health world,” says Ben R. Leedle, Jr., president and CEO of one of the world’s [...]
